com.cognifide.slice.mapper

Class GenericSlingMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.slice.mapper.GenericSlingMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mapper

    public class GenericSlingMapper
extends Object
implements Mapper
    Generic implementation of Mapper that maps Sling Resource to a SliceResource using reflection.
    It is assumed that SliceResource field names are exactly the same as property names in the JCR node represented by the resource. Mapper iterates over fields in the SliceResource and assigns values from resource to SliceResource using mapping strategy defined by the SliceResource.

    The mapper is extendable - it can process fields depending on a list of specified FieldProcessors. The mapper uses at least one FieldProcessor which is DefaultFieldProcessor.

    A field in SliceResource must be assignable from type of associated field in the repository, or an exception will be thrown during mapping. Using primitive types supported, but discouraged: if corresponding property is missing, the SliceResource should contain null value, and a higher level logic should handle it and assign default value. Such behavior is not possible with primitive types.

    Once a value of a field has been set (mapped) it can be post-processed by specified FieldPostProcessors.

    SliceResource fields can also be tagged with annotations to enable custom logic. Currently supported annotations are:
    • FieldProcessors:
      • JcrProperty - for mapping field to a property of different name, or defining that a field should be mapped if MappingStrategy.ANNOTATED was chosen
      • IgnoreProperty - those will be ignored by this Mapper if MappingStrategy.ALL was chosen
      • ImagePath - indicating Image resource type which should be mapped to String field
    • FieldPostProcessors:
      • Unescaped - for string values that should not be HTML-escaped
    See each annotation documentation for more detailed use guidelines.
